input: Which one of the following categories of persons is not treated at par so far as the availability of Fundamental Rights is concerned ?

options.B: Members of the forces charged with the responsibility of maintenance of public order
options.C: Members of the forces employed in connection with the communication systems set up in the country
options.D: Members of the forces employed in connection with the communication systems set up for maintenance of public order

explanation: Members of Armed Forces are not treated at par so far as the availability of Fundamental Rights is concerned.
